name: Prescription (mcreek)
description:
Figure out which combination of prescriptions will help you move towards happiness. 

Each medication (represented by a different color/size) has a different effect on the player. These are based off of actual prescriptions I was given ranging from mood stabilizers to antidepressants to stimulants.

This game is meant to be difficult because my experience was both long, painstaking, and at times very discouraging. But there is in fact something that works :)

*****

Use WASD to move

Press R to reset

Press Q to quit 

*****

Note - this is not a commentary on the effectiveness of specific prescriptions or mental illness/health. This is simply just my personal experience of trying different prescribed medications before figuring out what worked best for me :)
